titles.title: For the relief Jesus M. Collado-Munoz.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/5/1997--Introduced. Provides that a named individual shall not be considered to be inadmissible to, or deportable from, the United States or ineligible for U.S. citizenship by reason of a criminal offense to which he pleaded guilty.
